source.description:
Make 2x stock of serum-free neural freezing medium by adding
of sterile DMSO to
of sterile KOSR into a 50 ml conical tube. Mix by inverting 3-4 times. Store at
for up to 4 weeks.
Aspirate supernatant from 15mL conical tube containing 1 well of neural rosette clusters. See protocol below.

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"dkdoi","text":"On Day 5 of neural aggregate formation, remove media (by pipetting) and carefully wash spheres with  of pre-warmed DMEM\/F12. Repeat 2 times. Neural spheres are very delicate at this stage. An alternative approach is to remove   of spent media and wash with  . Add  . Transfer   of spheres and media to the new PLO\/laminin-coated well. This approach will transfer more dead cells into the new well. {"blocks":[{"key":"72b1m","text":"Remove the last wash and add   of neural induction media to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":29,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"DBF9637032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","amount":"50","unit":1,"label":"","step_guid":"A8A82E7032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}}],"guid":"A8A82E7032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709577,"previous_id":709576,"previous_guid":"A894F49032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jlf1","text":"Aspirate laminin from one well of the pre-coated plate. Using 200 \u03bcl sterile tips, carefully pipet up spheres from wells using  volume and transfer thirty-two spheres per well. Repeat above steps for the remaining wells. Incubate cells in  , 5% CO2 and 95% humidified chamber and distribute evenly by making a \u201cT\u201d motion. Once 90-100% of aggregates attach, exchange medium daily with 2mls\/well neural induction medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}}],"guid":"F6C9DC2032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709579,"previous_id":709578,"previous_guid":"DD9FC07032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eipdf","text":"Monitor spheres daily under microscope for formation of neural rosette structures. Neural rosettes are ready to harvest when spheres have completely flattened and clusters are clearly visible (3-7 days after plating, line dependent). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0E0B3AA032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709580,"previous_id":709579,"previous_guid":"F6C9DC2032E311E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9kf3","text":"Harvest neural rosettes by aspirating spent medium. Add  of pre-warmed DMEM\/F12 to each well to remove unattached cells (repeat if necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":56,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"265CD0A032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","amount":"1","unit":2,"label":"","step_guid":"19994C4032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}}],"guid":"19994C4032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709581,"previous_id":709580,"previous_guid":"0E0B3AA032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79obm","text":"Add   of Neural Rosette Selection reagent to each well and incubate for up to   at  (check cells at  . Cells are typically collected after 30-45 min incubation. Look for rosette structure to be rounding up without the disturbance of other surrounding cells). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":4,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":78,"length":1,"key":1},{"offset":83,"length":1,"key":2},{"offset":100,"length":1,"key":3}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3182D1A032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","amount":"1","unit":2,"label":"","step_guid":"2D85DA7032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"351B61B032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","duration":3600,"label":"","step_guid":"2D85DA7032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}},{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"36F4195032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","temperature":"37","unit":10,"label":"","step_guid":"2D85DA7032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3BE97A4032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","duration":1200,"label":"","step_guid":"2D85DA7032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}}],"guid":"2D85DA7032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709582,"previous_id":709581,"previous_guid":"19994C4032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g1qo","text":"Carefully remove Neural Rosette Selection reagent with a pipet, being careful not to disturb rosette clusters. Add   DMEM\/F12 to each well, then using a p1000 detach rosette clusters by  rinsing over them. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":115,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"46BFAD9032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","amount":"1","unit":2,"label":"","step_guid":"4167933032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2"}}],"guid":"4167933032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709583,"previous_id":709582,"previous_guid":"2D85DA7032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7e4qt","text":"Transfer rosette material from 1 well into a 15 mL conical tube for cryopreservation of neural rosettes and from 2 wells into a separate 15 mL conical tube for neural progenitor expansion. Do not triturate clusters. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b8o5t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"f7e9l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"key":"2jfr0","text":"To maintain a pure culture, it is best to leave some rosettes behind rather than collect all of the rosettes and additional cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}}],"guid":"5663959032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","id":709584,"previous_id":709583,"previous_guid":"4167933032E411E9AC957DCD0629DAD2","section":null}

source.description:
Add
of neural induction media supplemented with
of 2x neural freezing medium to the single well collection of neural rosette clusters. Gently mix solution and distribute 1 mL into sterile cryovials.

Store cryovials at
for at least
then transfer to liquid nitrogen for long-term storage.
